summary: Denise, an orphaned girl, moves to Paris where she hopes to find work at her uncle's store. But the glamorous department store 'Aux Bonheur des Dames' across the street crunches all the little businesses around. She finds a position there.
cast: Dita Parlo|Ginette Maddie|Andrée Brabant|Mireille Barsac|Nadia Sibirskaïa|Germaine Rouer|Simone Bourday|Cognet|Colette Dubois|Récopé|Yvonne Taponié|Marthe Barbara-Val|Marcelle Adam|Pierre de Guingand|Fabien Haziza|Fernand Mailly|René Donnio|Albert Bras|Adolphe Candé|Armand Bour|Charles Frank|Jean-Paul Roger|Durafour|Jean Liézer
title: El paraíso de las damas
